message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a great price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little more. How about $10,500?  This would be a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to go above $10,000 for the product. Would $10,000 be acceptable to you?
